Movie is excellent, quality is good for 1954 film, seeding 170GB and counting now
This had horrible quality with scratches and film grain, And the subtitles are shitty and inaccurate.

This rip is shit compared with the Criterion remastered version, trust me you want this one:

Don't get fooled by the cover image or the 1080p tag, the quality is terrible on this one
